actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-734, by Ms. Castor.

All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI. It shall be in order at any time on the legislative day of Thursday, June 26, 2008, for the Speaker entertain specified motions to suspend the rules.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 244.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1304.
DEBATE - The House continued with further debate on H. Res. 1304.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 228 - 198 (Roll no. 462).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 230 - 196 (Roll no. 463).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 6052) to promote increased public transportation use, to promote increased use of alternative fuels in providing public transportation, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 6052) to promote increased public transportation use, to promote increased use of alternative fuels in providing public transportation.

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 6052) to promote increased public transportation use, to promote increased use of alternative fuels in providing public transportation, and for other purposes.
